424.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
424.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
424.flavor_text:
The user bites with
flame-cloaked fangs.
It may also make the
foe flinch or sustain
a burn.

425.name: shadow-sneak
425.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
425.flavor_text:
The user extends its
shadow and attacks
the foe from behind.
This move always goes
first.

426.name: mud-bomb
426.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
426.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
426.flavor_text:
The user launches a
hard-packed mud ball
to attack.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

427.name: psycho-cut
427.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
427.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
427.flavor_text:
The user tears at
the foe with blades
formed by psychic
power. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

428.name: zen-headbutt
428.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
428.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
428.flavor_text:
The user focuses its
willpower to its head
and rams the foe.
It may also make the
target flinch.

429.name: mirror-shot
429.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
429.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
429.flavor_text:
The user looses a
flash of energy from
its polished body.
It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

430.name: flash-cannon
430.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
430.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
430.flavor_text:
The user gathers all
its light energy and
releases it at once.
It may also lower the
foe’s Sp. Def stat.

431.name: rock-climb
431.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
431.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
431.flavor_text:
A charging attack
that may also leave
the foe confused.
It can also be used
to scale rocky walls.

432.name: defog
432.description:
Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of mist, light screen, reflect, safeguard, spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the target's side of the field.

If the target is protected by mist, it will prevent the evasion change, then be removed by this move.
432.short_effect: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Removes field effects from the enemy field.
432.flavor_text:
Obstacles are moved,
reducing the foe’s
evasion stat. It can
also be used to
clear deep fog, etc.

433.name: trick-room
433.description:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding full incense, lagging tail, or quick claw and Pokémon with stall ignore this effect.
433.short_effect: For five turns, slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.
433.flavor_text:
The user creates a
bizarre area in which
slower Pokémon get
to move first for five
turns.

434.name: draco-meteor
434.description: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
434.short_effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
434.flavor_text:
Comets are summoned
down from the sky.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

435.name: discharge
435.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
435.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
435.flavor_text:
A flare of electricity
is loosed to strike
all Pokémon in battle.
It may also cause
paralysis.

436.name: lava-plume
436.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
436.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
436.flavor_text:
An inferno of scarlet
flames washes over
all Pokémon in battle.
It may also inflict
burns.

437.name: leaf-storm
437.description: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
437.short_effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
437.flavor_text:
A storm of sharp
leaves is whipped up.
The attack’s recoil
sharply reduces the
user’s Sp. Atk stat.

438.name: power-whip
438.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
438.flavor_text:
The user violently
whirls its vines or
tentacles to harshly
lash the foe.

439.name: rock-wrecker
439.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
439.short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
439.flavor_text:
The user launches a
huge boulder at the
foe to attack.
It must rest on the
next turn, however.

440.name: cross-poison
440.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
440.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
440.flavor_text:
A slashing attack
that may also leave
the target poisoned.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

441.name: gunk-shot
441.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
441.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
441.flavor_text:
The user shoots
filthy garbage at the
foe to attack.
It may also poison
the target.

442.name: iron-head
442.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
442.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
442.flavor_text:
The foe slams the
target with its
steel-hard head.
It may also make the
target flinch.

443.name: magnet-bomb
443.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
443.flavor_text:
The user launches a
steel bomb that
sticks to the target.
This attack will not
miss.

444.name: stone-edge
444.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
444.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
444.flavor_text:
The user stabs the
foe with a sharpened
stone. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

445.name: captivate
445.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
445.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.
445.flavor_text:
If it is the opposite
gender of the user,
the foe is charmed
into sharply lowering
its Sp. Atk stat.

446.name: stealth-rock
446.description:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.
446.short_effect: Causes damage when opposing Pokémon switch in.
446.flavor_text:
The user lays a trap
of levitating stones
around the foe. The
trap hurts foes that
switch into battle.

447.name: grass-knot
447.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120
447.short_effect: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.
447.flavor_text:
The user snares the
foe with grass and
trips it. The heavier
the foe, the greater
the damage.

448.name: chatter
448.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
448.short_effect: Has a higher chance to confuse the target when the recorded sound is louder.
448.flavor_text:
The user attacks
using a sound wave
based on words it has
learned. It may also
confuse the foe.

449.name: judgment
449.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
449.short_effect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
449.flavor_text:
The user releases
countless shots of
light. Its type varies
with the kind of Plate
the user is holding.

450.name: bug-bite
450.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
450.short_effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
450.flavor_text:
The user bites the
foe. If the foe is
holding a Berry, the
user eats it and
gains its effect.

451.name: charge-beam
451.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
451.short_effect: Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
451.flavor_text:
The user fires a
concentrated bundle
of electricity. It may
also raise the user’s
Sp. Atk stat.

452.name: wood-hammer
452.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
452.short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.
452.flavor_text:
The user slams its
rugged body into the
foe to attack. The
user also sustains
serious damage.

453.name: aqua-jet
453.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
453.flavor_text:
The user lunges at
the foe at a speed
that makes it almost
invisible. It is sure
to strike first.

454.name: attack-order
454.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
454.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
454.flavor_text:
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the
target. Critical hits land more easily.

455.name: defend-order
455.description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
455.short_effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
455.flavor_text:
The user calls out
its underlings to
make a living shield,
raising its Defense
and Sp. Def stats.

456.name: heal-order
456.description: Heals the user for half its max HP.
456.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.
456.flavor_text:
The user calls out
its underlings to heal
it. The user regains
up to half of its
max HP.

457.name: head-smash
457.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
457.short_effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
457.flavor_text:
The user delivers a
life-endangering head
butt at full power.
The user also takes
terrible damage.

458.name: double-hit
458.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
458.flavor_text:
The user slams the
foe with a tail, etc.
The target is hit
twice in a row.

459.name: roar-of-time
459.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
459.short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
459.flavor_text:
The user blasts the
foe with power that
distorts even time.
The user must rest
on the next turn.

460.name: spacial-rend
460.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
460.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
460.flavor_text:
The user tears the
foe along with the
space around it.
This move has a high
critical-hit ratio.

461.name: lunar-dance
461.description: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
461.short_effect: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
461.flavor_text:
The user faints. In
return, the Pokémon
taking its place will
have its status and
HP fully restored.

462.name: crush-grip
462.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.
462.short_effect: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.
462.flavor_text:
The foe is crushed
with great force.
The attack is more
powerful the more HP
the foe has left.

463.name: magma-storm
463.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
463.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
463.flavor_text:
The foe becomes
trapped within a
maelstrom of fire
that rages for two
to five turns.

464.name: dark-void
464.flavor_text:
The foe is dragged
into a world of total
darkness that puts it
to sleep.

465.name: seed-flare
465.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
465.short_effect: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.
465.flavor_text:
The user generates
a shock wave from
within its body.
It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def.

466.name: ominous-wind
466.description: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
466.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.
466.flavor_text:
The user creates a
gust of repulsive
wind. It may also
raise all the user’s
stats at once.

467.name: shadow-force
467.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
467.short_effect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
467.flavor_text:
The user disappears,
then strikes the foe
on the second turn.
It hits even if the
foe used Protect.

468.name: hone-claws
468.description: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.
468.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.
468.flavor_text:
The user sharpens its claws to
boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

469.name: wide-guard
469.description:
Moves with multiple targets will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
469.short_effect: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
469.flavor_text:
The user and its allies are protected from
wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used
in succession, its chance of failing rises.

470.name: guard-split
470.description: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
470.short_effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
470.flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of its target’s.

471.name: power-split
471.description:
Averages the user's unmodified Attack with the target's unmodified Attack; the value becomes the unmodified Attack for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Attack is averaged the same way.

This effect applies before any other persistent changes to unmodified Attack or Special Attack, such as flower gift during sunny day.
471.short_effect: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.
471.flavor_text:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats
with those of the target’s.

472.name: wonder-room
472.description: For five turns (including this one), every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped.
472.short_effect: All Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.
472.flavor_text:
The user creates a bizarre area in which
Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def
stats are swapped for five turns.

473.name: psyshock
473.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
473.short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
473.flavor_text:
The user materializes an odd
psychic wave to attack the target.
This attack does physical damage.

474.name: venoshock
474.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
474.short_effect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
474.flavor_text:
The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled
if the target is poisoned.

475.name: autotomize
475.description: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.  Halves the user's weight; this effect does not stack.
475.short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages and halves the user's weight.
475.flavor_text:
The user sheds part of its body
to make itself lighter and sharply
raise its Speed stat.

476.name: rage-powder
476.description:
Until the end of this turn, any moves that opposing Pokémon target solely at the user's ally will instead target the user.  If both Pokémon on the same side of the field use this move on the same turn, the Pokémon that uses it last will become the target.

This effect takes priority over lightning rod and storm drain.

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
476.short_effect: Redirects the target's single-target effects to the user for this turn.
476.flavor_text:
The user scatters a cloud of irritating
powder to draw attention to itself.
Opponents aim only at the user.

477.name: telekinesis
477.description:
For three turns (including this one), moves used against the target have 100% accuracy, but the target is immune to ground damage.  Accuracy of one-hit KO moves is exempt from this effect.

This effect is removed by gravity.  If Gravity is already in effect, this move will fail.
477.short_effect: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.
477.flavor_text:
The user makes the target float with its
psychic power. The target is easier to
hit for three turns.

478.name: magic-room
478.description: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
478.short_effect: Negates held items for five turns.
478.flavor_text:
The user creates a bizarre area
in which Pokémon’s held items
lose their effects for five turns.

479.name: smack-down
479.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the target's immunity to ground-type damage.  This effect removes any existing Ground immunity due to levitate, magnet rise, or telekinesis, and causes the target's flying type to be ignored when it takes Ground damage.

If the target isn't immune to Ground damage, this move will fail.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, and ends the effect of Bounce or Fly.
479.short_effect: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.
479.flavor_text:
The user throws a stone or projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will
fall to the ground when hit.

480.name: storm-throw
480.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
480.flavor_text:
The user strikes the target with a fierce
blow. This attack always results in a
critical hit.

481.name: flame-burst
481.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
481.short_effect: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
481.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with a
bursting flame. The bursting flame damages
Pokémon next to the target as well.

482.name: sludge-wave
482.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
482.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
482.flavor_text:
It swamps the area around the user with a
giant sludge wave.
It may also poison those hit.

483.name: quiver-dance
483.description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
483.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
483.flavor_text:
The user lightly performs a beautiful,
mystic dance. It boosts the user’s
Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

484.name: heavy-slam
484.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120
484.short_effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
484.flavor_text:
The user slams into the target with its
heavy body. The more the user outweighs
the target, the greater its damage.

485.name: synchronoise
485.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
485.short_effect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
485.flavor_text:
Using an odd shock wave, the user
inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same
type in the area around it.

486.name: electro-ball
486.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's Speed compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 150.

User's Speed                     | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's Speed      |    60
Up to 3× the target's Speed      |    80
Up to 4× the target's Speed      |   120
More than 4× the target's Speed  |   150
486.short_effect: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.
486.flavor_text:
The user hurls an electric orb
at the target. The faster the user is
than the target, the greater the damage.

487.name: soak
487.description: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field.  If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
487.short_effect: Changes the target's type to Water.
487.flavor_text:
The user shoots a torrent of water
at the target and changes
the target’s type to Water.

488.name: flame-charge
488.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
488.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Speed by one stage.
488.flavor_text:
The user cloaks itself with flame and
attacks. Building up more power,
it raises the user’s Speed stat.

489.name: coil
489.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
489.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.
489.flavor_text:
The user coils up and concentrates.
This raises its Attack and Defense stats
as well as its accuracy.

490.name: low-sweep
490.description: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
490.short_effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
490.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target’s legs
swiftly, reducing the target’s
Speed stat.

491.name: acid-spray
491.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
491.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.
491.flavor_text:
The user spits fluid that works to melt
the target. This harshly reduces
the target’s Sp. Def stat.

492.name: foul-play
492.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.
492.short_effect: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.
492.flavor_text:
The user turns the target’s power
against it. The higher the target’s
Attack stat, the greater the damage.

493.name: simple-beam
493.description: Changes the target's ability to simple.
493.short_effect: Changes the target's ability to Simple.
493.flavor_text:
The user’s mysterious psychic wave
changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

494.name: entrainment
494.description: Changes the target's ability to match the user's.  This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
494.short_effect: Copies the user's ability onto the target.
494.flavor_text:
The user dances with an odd rhythm that
compels the target to mimic it, making the
target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

495.name: after-you
495.description:
The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.
If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
495.short_effect: Makes the target act next this turn.
495.flavor_text:
The user helps the target and makes it
use its move right after the user.

496.name: round
496.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If round has already been used this turn, this move's power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
496.short_effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.
496.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with a song.
Others can join in the Round and make
the attack do greater damage.

497.name: echoed-voice
497.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
497.short_effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
497.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with an
echoing voice. If this move is used
every turn, it does greater damage.

498.name: chip-away
498.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
498.flavor_text:
Looking for an opening, the user strikes
continually. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.

499.name: clear-smog
499.description: Inflicts regular damage.  All of the target's stat modifiers are reset to zero.
499.short_effect: Removes all of the target's stat modifiers.
499.flavor_text:
The user attacks by throwing a clump of
special mud. All status changes are
returned to normal.

500.name: stored-power
500.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
500.short_effect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
500.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with stored
power. The more the user’s stats are
raised, the greater the damage.

501.name: quick-guard
501.description:
Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
501.short_effect: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.
501.flavor_text:
The user protects itself and its allies
from priority moves. If used in
succession, its chance of failing rises.

502.name: ally-switch
502.description: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
502.short_effect: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
502.flavor_text:
The user teleports using a strange power
and switches its place with one of
its allies.

503.name: scald
503.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
503.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
503.flavor_text:
The user shoots boiling hot water at
its target. It may also leave the target
with a burn.

504.name: shell-smash
504.description: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
504.short_effect: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
504.flavor_text:
The user breaks its shell, lowering its
Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply
raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

505.name: heal-pulse
505.description: Heals the target for half its max HP.
505.short_effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
505.flavor_text:
The user emits a healing pulse which
restores the target’s HP by up to
half of its max HP.

506.name: hex
506.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a major status ailment, this move has double power.
506.short_effect: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.
506.flavor_text:
This relentless attack does massive
damage to a target affected
by status problems.

507.name: sky-drop
507.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  User carries the target high into the air for one turn, during which no moves will hit either Pokémon and neither can act.  On the following turn, the user drops the target, inflicting damage and ending the effect.

If the target is flying-type, this move will function as normal but inflict no damage.

gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  gust and twister will additionally have double power.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during this effect.

Either Pokémon may be hit during this effect if also under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.

*Bug*: If gravity is used during a double or triple battle while this move is in effect, this move is not correctly canceled on the target, and it remains high in the air indefinitely.  As this move prevents the target from acting, the only way to subsequently remove it from the field is to faint it.
507.short_effect: Carries the target high into the air, dodging all attacks against either, and drops it next turn.
507.flavor_text:
The user takes the target into the sky,
then drops it during the next turn.
The target cannot attack while in the sky.

508.name: shift-gear
508.description: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
508.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
508.flavor_text:
The user rotates its gears, raising its
Attack and sharply raising its Speed.

509.name: circle-throw
509.description:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
509.short_effect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
509.flavor_text:
The user throws the target and drags out
another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

510.name: incinerate
510.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, it's destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
510.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with fire.
If the target is holding a Berry, the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

511.name: quash
511.description: Forces the target to act last this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority.  If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
511.short_effect: Makes the target act last this turn.
511.flavor_text:
The user suppresses the target and
makes its move go last.

512.name: acrobatics
512.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user has no held item, this move has double power.
512.short_effect: Has double power if the user has no held item.
512.flavor_text:
The user nimbly strikes the target.
If the user is not holding an item,
this attack inflicts massive damage.

513.name: reflect-type
513.description: User's type changes to match the target's.
513.flavor_text:
The user reflects the target’s type,
making it the same type as the target.

514.name: retaliate
514.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
514.short_effect: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
514.flavor_text:
The user gets revenge for a fainted ally.
If an ally fainted in the previous turn,
this attack’s damage increases.

515.name: final-gambit
515.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
515.short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to the user's remaining HP.  User faints.
515.flavor_text:
The user risks everything to attack its
target. The user faints but does damage
equal to the user’s HP.

516.name: bestow
516.description: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
516.short_effect: Gives the user's held item to the target.
516.flavor_text:
The user passes its held item to the target when the
target isn’t holding an item.

517.name: inferno
517.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
517.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.
517.flavor_text:
The user attacks by engulfing the target
in an intense fire. It leaves the target
with a burn.

518.name: water-pledge
518.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used grass pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon have halved Speed for four turns (including this one).
518.short_effect: With Grass Pledge, halves opposing Pokémon's Speed for four turns.
518.flavor_text:
A column of water strikes the target. When
combined with its fire equivalent, the
damage increases and a rainbow appears.

519.name: fire-pledge
519.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
519.short_effect: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.
519.flavor_text:
A column of fire hits opposing Pokémon.
When used with its Grass equivalent, its
damage increases into a vast sea of fire.

520.name: grass-pledge
520.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
520.short_effect: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
520.flavor_text:
A column of grass hits opposing Pokémon.
When used with its water equivalent, its
damage increases into a vast swamp.

521.name: volt-switch
521.description:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
521.short_effect: User must switch out after attacking.
521.flavor_text:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

522.name: struggle-bug
522.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
522.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
522.flavor_text:
While resisting, the user attacks the
opposing Pokémon. The targets’
Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

523.name: bulldoze
523.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
523.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
523.flavor_text:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area. Hit
Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.

524.name: frost-breath
524.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Always scores a critical hit.
524.flavor_text:
The user blows a cold breath on the
target. This attack always results in
a critical hit.

525.name: dragon-tail
525.description:
Inflicts regular damage, then switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon, selected at random.

If the target is under the effect of ingrain or suction cups, or it has a substitute, or its Trainer has no more usable Pokémon, it will not be switched out.  If the target is a wild Pokémon, the battle ends instead.
525.short_effect: Ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
525.flavor_text:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

526.name: work-up
526.description: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
526.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
526.flavor_text:
The user is roused, and its Attack
and Sp. Atk stats increase.

527.name: electroweb
527.description: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
527.short_effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
527.flavor_text:
The user captures and attacks opposing
Pokémon by using an electric net. It
reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

528.name: wild-charge
528.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
528.short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
528.flavor_text:
The user shrouds itself in electricity
and smashes into its target.
It also damages the user a little.

529.name: drill-run
529.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
529.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
529.flavor_text:
The user crashes into its target while
rotating its body like a drill.
Critical hits land more easily.

530.name: dual-chop
530.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
530.flavor_text:
The user attacks its target by hitting
it with brutal strikes.
The target is hit twice in a row.

531.name: heart-stamp
531.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
531.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
531.flavor_text:
The user unleashes a vicious blow after
its cute act makes the target less wary.
It may also make the target flinch.

532.name: horn-leech
532.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
532.short_effect: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
532.flavor_text:
The user drains the target’s energy with
its horns. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.

533.name: sacred-sword
533.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
533.flavor_text:
The user attacks by slicing with its long
horns. The target’s stat changes
don’t affect this attack’s damage.

534.name: razor-shell
534.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
534.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
534.flavor_text:
The user cuts its target with sharp
shells. This attack may also lower the
target’s Defense stat.

535.name: heat-crash
535.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120
535.short_effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
535.flavor_text:
The user slams its target with its flame-
covered body. The more the user outweighs
the target, the greater the damage.

536.name: leaf-tornado
536.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
536.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
536.flavor_text:
The user attacks its target by
encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack
may also lower the target’s accuracy.

537.name: steamroller
537.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
537.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
537.flavor_text:
The user crushes its targets by rolling
over them with its rolled-up body.
This attack may make the target flinch.

538.name: cotton-guard
538.description: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
538.short_effect: Raises the user's Defense by three stages.
538.flavor_text:
The user protects itself by wrapping
its body in soft cotton, drastically
raising the user’s Defense stat.

539.name: night-daze
539.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
539.short_effect: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
539.flavor_text:
The user lets loose a pitch-black shock
wave at its target. It may also lower the
target’s accuracy.

540.name: psystrike
540.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
540.short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
540.flavor_text:
The user materializes an odd
psychic wave to attack the target.
This attack does physical damage.

541.name: tail-slap
541.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Hits 2–5 times in one turn.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.
541.flavor_text:
The user attacks by striking the target
with its hard tail. It hits the target two
to five times in a row.

542.name: hurricane
542.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
542.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
542.flavor_text:
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent
in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky.
It may also confuse the target.

543.name: head-charge
543.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
543.short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
543.flavor_text:
The user charges its head into its
target, using its powerful guard hair.
It also damages the user a little.

544.name: gear-grind
544.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
544.flavor_text:
The user attacks by throwing
two steel gears at its target.

545.name: searing-shot
545.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
545.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
545.flavor_text:
An inferno of scarlet flames torches
everything around the user. It may
leave targets with a burn.

546.name: techno-blast
546.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
546.short_effect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
546.flavor_text:
The user fires a beam of light at
its target. The type changes depending
on the Drive the user holds.

547.name: relic-song
547.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
If the user is a meloetta, it will toggle between Aria and Pirouette Forme.
547.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to put the target to sleep.
547.flavor_text:
The user sings an ancient song and attacks
by appealing to the hearts of those
listening. It may also induce sleep.

548.name: secret-sword
548.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
548.short_effect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
548.flavor_text:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd
power contained in the horn does physical
damage to the target.

549.name: glaciate
549.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
549.short_effect: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.
549.flavor_text:
The user attacks by blowing freezing cold
air at opposing Pokémon. This attack
reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

550.name: bolt-strike
550.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
550.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to paralyze the target.
550.flavor_text:
The user charges its target, surrounding
itself with a great amount of electricity.
It may leave the target with paralysis.

551.name: blue-flare
551.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
551.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
551.flavor_text:
The user attacks by engulfing the target
in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame.
It may leave the target with a burn.

552.name: fiery-dance
552.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
552.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.
552.flavor_text:
Cloaked in flames, the user dances
and flaps its wings. It may also
raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

553.name: freeze-shock
553.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
553.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
553.flavor_text:
On the second turn, the user hits the
target with electrically charged ice.
It may leave the target with paralysis.

554.name: ice-burn
554.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
554.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
554.flavor_text:
On the second turn, an ultracold,
freezing wind surrounds the target.
This may leave the target with a burn.

555.name: snarl
555.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
555.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
555.flavor_text:
The user yells as if it is ranting about
something, making the target’s Sp. Atk
stat decrease.

556.name: icicle-crash
556.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
556.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
556.flavor_text:
The user attacks by harshly dropping
an icicle onto the target.
It may also make the target flinch.

557.name: v-create
557.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
557.short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
557.flavor_text:
With a hot flame on its forehead, the user
hurls itself at its target. It lowers the
user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

558.name: fusion-flare
558.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion bolt earlier this turn, this move has double power.
558.short_effect: With Fusion Bolt, inflicts double damage.
558.flavor_text:
The user brings down a giant flame.
This attack does greater damage when
influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

559.name: fusion-bolt
559.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used fusion flare earlier this turn, this move has double power.
559.short_effect: With Fusion Flare, inflicts double damage.
559.flavor_text:
The user throws down a giant thunderbolt.
This attack does greater damage
when influenced by an enormous flame.

560.name: flying-press
560.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the purposes of type effectiveness, this move is both fighting- and flying-type: its final effectiveness is determined by multiplying the effectiveness of each type against each of the target's types.

For all other purposes, this move is pure Fighting-type.  If this move's type is changed, its Fighting typing is overwritten, and its secondary type remains Flying.

If the target has used minimize since entering battle, this move has double power and will never miss.
560.short_effect: Deals both fighting and flying-type damage.
560.flavor_text:
The user dives down onto the target
from the sky. This move is Fighting
and Flying type simultaneously.

561.name: mat-block
561.description: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
561.short_effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
561.flavor_text:
Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user
protects itself and its allies from damaging moves.
This does not stop status moves.

562.name: belch
562.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  Can only be used if the user has eaten a berry since the beginning of the battle.

After the user eats a berry, it may use this move any number of times until the end of the battle, even if it switches out.  Eating a held berry, eating a berry via bug bite or pluck, or being the target of a Flung berry will enable this move.  Feeding a Pokémon a berry from the bag or using natural gift will not.

If the trainer chooses this move when it cannot be used, the choice is rejected outright and the trainer must choose another move.
562.short_effect: Can only be used after the user has eaten a berry.
562.flavor_text:
The user lets out a damaging belch
at the target. The user must eat a held
Berry to use this move.

563.name: rototiller
563.description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
563.short_effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grass Pokémon in battle.
563.flavor_text:
Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier
for plants to grow. This raises the Attack
and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

564.name: sticky-web
564.description:
Shoots a web over the opponents' side of the field, which lowers the Speed of any opposing Pokémon that enters the field by one stage.

Pokémon in the air, such as flying-types and those with levitate, are unaffected.  rapid spin removes Sticky Web from the user's side of the field; defog removes it from both sides.
564.short_effect: Covers the opposing field, lowering opponents' Speed by one stage upon switching in.
564.flavor_text:
The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing
team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching
into battle.

565.name: fell-stinger
565.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
565.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
565.flavor_text:
When the user knocks out a target
with this move, the user’s Attack stat
rises sharply.

566.name: phantom-force
566.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  User vanishes for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

This move ignores the effects of detect and protect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
566.short_effect: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.
566.flavor_text:
The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes
the target on the next turn.
This move hits even if the target protects itself.

567.name: trick-or-treat
567.description: Adds ghost to the target's types.
567.short_effect: Adds ghost to the target's types.
567.flavor_text:
The user takes the target trick-or-treating.
This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

568.name: noble-roar
568.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
568.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
568.flavor_text:
Letting out a noble roar, the user
intimidates the target and lowers
its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

569.name: ion-deluge
569.description: Changes all Pokémon's normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
569.short_effect: Changes all normal moves to electric moves for the rest of the turn.
569.flavor_text:
The user disperses electrically charged
particles, which changes Normal-type
moves to Electric-type moves.

570.name: parabolic-charge
570.description: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
570.short_effect: Heals the user for half the total damage dealt to all targets.
570.flavor_text:
The user attacks everything around it.
The user’s HP is restored by half
the damage taken by those hit.

571.name: forests-curse
571.description: Adds grass to the target's types.
571.short_effect: Adds grass to the target's types.
571.flavor_text:
The user puts a forest curse on the target.
Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

572.name: petal-blizzard
572.flavor_text:
The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard
and attacks everything around it.

573.name: freeze-dry
573.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  This move is super-effective against the water type.

The target's other type will affect damage as usual.  If this move's type is changed, it remains super-effective against Water regardless of its type.
573.flavor_text:
The user rapidly cools the target.
This may also leave the target frozen.
This move is super effective on Water types.

574.name: disarming-voice
574.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion.
574.flavor_text:
Letting out a charming cry, the user does
emotional damage to opposing Pokémon.
This attack never misses.

575.name: parting-shot
575.description: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
575.short_effect: Lowers all targets' Attack and Special Attack by one stage.  Makes the user switch out.
575.flavor_text:
With a parting threat, the user lowers
the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
Then it switches with a party Pokémon.

576.name: topsy-turvy
576.flavor_text:
All stat changes affecting the target
turn topsy-turvy and become the
opposite of what they were.

577.name: draining-kiss
577.description: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
577.short_effect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
577.flavor_text:
The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.

578.name: crafty-shield
578.description:
Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves for the rest of the turn.

Unlike other blocking moves, this move may be used consecutively without its chance of success falling.
578.short_effect: Protects all friendly Pokémon from non-damaging moves.
578.flavor_text:
The user protects itself and its allies from
status moves with a mysterious power.
This does not stop moves that do damage.

579.name: flower-shield
579.description: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
579.short_effect: Raises the Defense of all grass Pokémon in battle.
579.flavor_text:
The user raises the Defense stat
of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle
with a mysterious power.

580.name: grassy-terrain
580.description:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to energy ball.
580.short_effect: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.
580.flavor_text:
The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet
to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of
Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

581.name: misty-terrain
581.description:
For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion and weakens dragon moves used against them to 0.5× their power.

Changes nature power to moonblast.
581.short_effect: For five turns, protects all Pokémon on the ground from major status ailments and confusion, and halves the power of incoming dragon moves.
581.flavor_text:
The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet
with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon
on the ground from status conditions.

582.name: electrify
582.description: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
582.short_effect: Changes the target's move's type to electric if it hasn't moved yet this turn.
582.flavor_text:
If the target is electrified before it uses
a move during that turn, the target’s
move becomes Electric type.

583.name: play-rough
583.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
583.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
583.flavor_text:
The user plays rough with the target
and attacks it. This may also lower
the target’s Attack stat.

584.name: fairy-wind
584.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
584.flavor_text:
The user stirs up a fairy wind
and strikes the target with it.

585.name: moonblast
585.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
585.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
585.flavor_text:
Borrowing the power of the moon,
the user attacks the target.
This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

586.name: boomburst
586.flavor_text:
The user attacks everything around it
with the destructive power of a terrible,
explosive sound.

587.name: fairy-lock
587.description: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
587.short_effect: Prevents all Pokémon from fleeing or switching out during the next turn.
587.flavor_text:
By locking down the battlefield,
the user keeps all Pokémon from
fleeing during the next turn.

588.name: kings-shield
588.description: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
588.short_effect: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
588.flavor_text:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack

589.name: play-nice
589.description: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
589.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
589.flavor_text:
The user and the target become friends,
and the target loses its will to fight.
This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

590.name: confide
590.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
590.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
590.flavor_text:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target

the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

591.name: diamond-storm
591.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
591.short_effect: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Defense by two stages for each target hit.
591.flavor_text:
The user whips up a storm of diamonds

also raise the user’s Defense stat.

592.name: steam-eruption
592.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
592.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
592.flavor_text:
The user immerses the target in superheated steam.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

593.name: hyperspace-hole
593.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.
593.flavor_text:
Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears

594.name: water-shuriken
594.flavor_text:
The user hits the target with throwing

This move always goes first.

595.name: mystical-fire
595.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
595.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
595.flavor_text:
The user attacks by breathing
a special, hot fire. This also
lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

596.name: spiky-shield
596.description: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
596.short_effect: Blocks damaging attacks and damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP.
596.flavor_text:
In addition to protecting the user from attacks,
this move also damages any attacker who
makes direct contact.

597.name: aromatic-mist
597.description: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
597.short_effect: Raises a selected ally's Special Defense by one stage.
597.flavor_text:
The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally
Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

598.name: eerie-impulse
598.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.
598.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.
598.flavor_text:
The user’s body generates an eerie impulse.
Exposing the target to it harshly lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

599.name: venom-drench
599.description: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
599.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
599.flavor_text:
Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd
poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack,
Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

600.name: powder
600.description: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
600.short_effect: Explodes if the target uses a fire move this turn, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP and preventing the move.
600.flavor_text:
The user covers the target in a powder
that explodes and damages the target
if it uses a Fire-type move.

601.name: geomancy
601.description: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
601.short_effect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
601.flavor_text:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises
its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats
on the next turn.

602.name: magnetic-flux
602.description: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
602.short_effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
602.flavor_text:
The user manipulates magnetic fields,
which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats
of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

603.name: happy-hour
603.description:
Doubles prize money.

Stacks with a held item.  Only works once per battle.
603.flavor_text:
Using Happy Hour doubles
the amount of prize money
received after battle.

604.name: electric-terrain
604.description:
For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
604.short_effect: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
604.flavor_text:
The user electrifies the ground under
everyone’s feet for five turns.
Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

605.name: dazzling-gleam
605.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
605.flavor_text:
The user damages opposing Pokémon
by emitting a powerful flash.

606.name: celebrate
606.flavor_text:
The Pokémon congratulates
you on your special day!

607.name: hold-hands
607.flavor_text:
The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them
very happy.

608.name: baby-doll-eyes
608.description: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
608.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
608.flavor_text:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move
always goes first.

609.flavor_text:
The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified

611.name: infestation
611.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
611.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
611.flavor_text:
The target is infested and attacked for
four to five turns.
The target can’t flee during this time.

612.name: power-up-punch

612.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
612.flavor_text:
Striking opponents over and over makes
the user’s fists harder.
Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

613.name: oblivion-wing
613.description: Deals regular damage.  Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
613.short_effect: Drains 75% of the damage inflicted to heal the user.
613.flavor_text:
The user absorbs its target’s HP.
The user’s HP is restored by over half
of the damage taken by the target.

614.name: thousand-arrows

614.short_effect: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
614.flavor_text:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon

615.name: thousand-waves
615.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
615.short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.
615.flavor_text:
The user attacks with a wave
that crawls along the ground.
Those hit can’t flee from battle.

616.name: lands-wrath

616.flavor_text:
The user gathers the energy of the land
and focuses that power on opposing
Pokémon to damage them.

617.name: light-of-ruin

617.short_effect: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.
617.flavor_text:
Drawing power from the Eternal Flower,
the user fires a powerful beam of light.
This also damages the user quite a lot.

618.name: origin-pulse

The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless
beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

619.name: precipice-blades

The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting
the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

620.name: dragon-ascent

620.short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
620.flavor_text:
After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by
dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it
lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.

621.name: hyperspace-fury

621.flavor_text:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect

622.name: breakneck-blitz--physical

622.flavor_text:
The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power
and crashes into the target at full speed. The power
varies, depending on the original move.

623.name: breakneck-blitz--special
623.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

624.name: all-out-pummeling--physical
624.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
624.flavor_text:
The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power
into the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

625.name: all-out-pummeling--special
625.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

626.name: supersonic-skystrike--physical
626.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
626.flavor_text:
The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets
toward the target at full speed. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

627.name: supersonic-skystrike--special
627.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

628.name: acid-downpour--physical
628.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
628.flavor_text:
The user creates a poisonous swamp using its
Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.

629.name: acid-downpour--special
629.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

630.name: tectonic-rage--physical
630.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
630.flavor_text:
The user burrows deep into the ground and slams

The power varies, depending on the original move.

631.name: tectonic-rage--special
631.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

632.name: continental-crush--physical

632.flavor_text:
The user summons a huge rock mountain using its

The power varies, depending on the original move.

633.name: continental-crush--special
633.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

634.name: savage-spin-out--physical
634.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
634.flavor_text:
The user binds the target with full force with

The power varies, depending on the original move.

635.name: savage-spin-out--special
635.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

636.name: never-ending-nightmare--physical
636.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
636.flavor_text:
Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s
Z-Power trap the target. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

637.name: never-ending-nightmare--special
637.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

638.name: corkscrew-crash--physical
638.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
638.flavor_text:
The user spins very fast and rams into the target
with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

639.name: corkscrew-crash--special
639.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

640.name: inferno-overdrive--physical
640.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
640.flavor_text:
The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward
the target with the full force of its Z-Power.
The power varies depending on the original move.

641.name: inferno-overdrive--special
641.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

642.name: hydro-vortex--physical
642.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
642.flavor_text:
The user creates a huge whirling current using
its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.

643.name: hydro-vortex--special
643.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

644.name: bloom-doom--physical
644.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
644.flavor_text:
The user collects energy from plants using its
Z-Power and attacks the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.

645.name: bloom-doom--special
645.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

646.name: gigavolt-havoc--physical
646.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
646.flavor_text:
The user hits the target with a powerful electric
current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

647.name: gigavolt-havoc--special
647.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

648.name: shattered-psyche--physical
648.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
648.flavor_text:
The user controls the target with its Z-Power and
hurts the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

649.name: shattered-psyche--special
649.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

650.name: subzero-slammer--physical
650.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
650.flavor_text:
The user dramatically drops the temperature using
its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.

651.name: subzero-slammer--special
651.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

652.name: devastating-drake--physical
652.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
652.flavor_text:
The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and
attacks the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

653.name: devastating-drake--special
653.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

654.name: black-hole-eclipse--physical
654.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
654.flavor_text:
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power
and sucks the target into it. The power varies,
depending on the original move.

655.name: black-hole-eclipse--special
655.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

656.name: twinkle-tackle--physical
656.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
656.flavor_text:
The user creates a very charming space using its
Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power
varies, depending on the original move.

657.name: twinkle-tackle--special
657.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

658.name: catastropika
658.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
658.flavor_text:
The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the
maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power
and pounces on its target with full force.

659.name: shore-up
659.description: Heals the user for ½ its max HP.  During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
659.short_effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
659.flavor_text:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

660.name: first-impression
660.description: Inflicts regular damage. Can only be used on the user's first turn after entering the field.
660.short_effect: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle.
660.flavor_text:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn the user is in battle.

661.name: baneful-bunker
661.description: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn.  If a Pokémon attempts to use a move that makes contact with the user, that Pokémon will be poisoned.  This move's chance of success halves every time it's used consecutively with any other protection move.
661.short_effect: Grants the user protection for the rest of the turn and poisons any Pokémon that tries to use a contact move on it.
661.flavor_text:
In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this
move also poisons any attacker that makes
direct contact.

662.name: spirit-shackle
662.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
662.flavor_text:
The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the
target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target
from escaping.

663.name: darkest-lariat
663.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation ignores the target's stat modifiers, including evasion.
663.flavor_text:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.

664.name: sparkling-aria
664.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has a burn and takes damage from this move, its burn is healed.
664.flavor_text:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.

665.name: ice-hammer
665.description: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Speed by one stage.
665.short_effect: Lowers user's Speed by one stage.
665.flavor_text:
The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

666.name: floral-healing
666.description: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
666.short_effect: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
666.flavor_text:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.

667.name: high-horsepower
667.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
667.flavor_text:
The user fiercely attacks the target using its
entire body.

668.name: strength-sap
668.description:
