If the target's Attack is already at -6, this move will fail.  In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.
668.short_effect: Heals the user by the target's current Attack stat and lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
668.flavor_text:
The user restores its HP by the same amount as the
target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s
Attack stat.

669.name: solar-blade
669.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

During sunny day, the charge turn is skipped.

During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, power is halved.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
669.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.
669.flavor_text:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and
fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the
target on the next turn.

670.name: leafage
670.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
670.flavor_text: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

671.name: spotlight
671.description: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.
671.short_effect: Forces the target's opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
671.flavor_text:
The user shines a spotlight on the target so that
only the target will be attacked during the turn.

672.name: toxic-thread
672.description: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.
672.short_effect: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by one stage.
672.flavor_text:
The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the
target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

673.name: laser-focus
673.description: The user's next move will result in a critical hit.
673.short_effect: Guarantees a critical hit with the user's next move.
673.flavor_text:
The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the
next turn always results in a critical hit.

674.name: gear-up
674.description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
674.short_effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
674.flavor_text:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.

675.name: throat-chop
675.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Silences the target for two turns, preventing it from using any sound-based moves.
675.short_effect: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.
675.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target’s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.

676.name: pollen-puff
676.description: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
676.short_effect: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
676.flavor_text:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

677.name: anchor-shot
677.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Traps the target.
677.flavor_text:
The user entangles the target with its anchor chain
while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

678.name: psychic-terrain
678.description:
Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain for 5 turns.  Overrides electric terrain, grassy terrain, and misty terrain.

All Pokémon on the ground are immune to moves with priority greater than 0.  (Moves that target the field rather than individual Pokémon, such as spikes, are not affected.)  Additionally, when a Pokémon on the ground uses a psychic-type move, that move's power is increased to 1.5×.

If a Pokémon is holding a Terrain Extender when creating Psychic Terrain (by any means), the effect lasts for 8 turns instead of 5.
678.short_effect: Protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and increases the power of their  Psychic moves by 50%.
678.flavor_text:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority
moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for
five turns.

679.name: lunge
679.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
679.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
679.flavor_text:
The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with
full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

680.name: fire-lash
680.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
680.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
680.flavor_text:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

681.name: power-trip
681.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user's stats have been raised.  Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move's power.  For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move's power is 31×.
681.short_effect: Power is higher the more the user's stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
681.flavor_text:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.

682.name: burn-up
682.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the user's fire type after damage calculation.  If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
682.short_effect: Removes the user's fire type after inflicting damage.
682.flavor_text:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.

683.name: speed-swap
683.description: Exchanges the original Speed stats of the user and target.
683.short_effect: Exchanges the user's Speed with the target's.
683.flavor_text: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

684.name: smart-strike
684.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
684.flavor_text:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This
attack never misses.

685.name: purify
685.description: Cures the target of its major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.  If the target has no major status ailment, this move will fail.
685.short_effect: Cures the target of a major status ailment and heals the user for 50% of its max HP.
685.flavor_text:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

686.name: revelation-dance
686.description: Inflicts regular damage.  This move's type matches the user's first type, if any; otherwise, it's typeless.
686.short_effect: Has the same type as the user.
686.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.
The user’s type determines the type of this move.

687.name: core-enforcer
687.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.
687.short_effect: Nullifies the target's ability if it moves earlier.
687.flavor_text:
If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.

688.name: trop-kick
688.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
688.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
688.flavor_text:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

689.name: instruct
689.description: The target immediately uses its most recently-used move.  This is independent of the target's normal action for the turn (i.e., it may end up moving twice), but otherwise functions as usual, including deduction of PP.  This effect works for disabled moves and ignores torment.
689.short_effect: Forces the target to repeat its last used move.
689.flavor_text:
The user instructs the target to use the target’s last
move again.

690.name: beak-blast
690.description: Begins charging at the start of the turn, then attacks as normal.  Any Pokémon that makes contact with the user while charging is burned.  The charging is not affected by accuracy, sleep, paralysis, or any other effect that would interfere with a move.
690.short_effect: Inflicts a burn on any Pokémon that makes contact before the attack.
690.flavor_text:
The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks
the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon
while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

691.name: clanging-scales
691.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the user's Defense by one stage.
691.short_effect: Lowers the user's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
691.flavor_text:
The user rubs the scales on its entire body and
makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon.
The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

692.name: dragon-hammer
692.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
692.flavor_text:
The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the
target and inflict damage.

693.name: brutal-swing
693.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
693.flavor_text:
The user swings its body around violently to inflict
damage on everything in its vicinity.

694.name: aurora-veil
694.description:
Places the Aurora Veil effect on the user's side of the field for the next 5 turns.  If the weather is not hail, or the weather is disabled by the effects of cloud nine or air lock, this move will fail.

Any regular damage dealt to an affected Pokémon is reduced by ½.  (If there are multiple Pokémon on the affected field, the reduction is ⅓.)
694.short_effect: Reduces damage five turns, but must be used during hail.
694.flavor_text:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.

695.name: sinister-arrow-raid
695.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
695.flavor_text:
The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows
using its Z-Power and shoots the target with
full force.

696.name: malicious-moonsault
696.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
696.flavor_text:
The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using
its Z-Power and crashes into the target with
full force.

697.name: oceanic-operetta
697.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
697.flavor_text:
The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of 
water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with 
full force.

698.name: guardian-of-alola
698.description: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target's remaining HP.
698.short_effect: Damages the target for 75% of its remaining HP.
698.flavor_text:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.

699.name: soul-stealing-7-star-strike
699.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
699.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow,
punches and kicks the target consecutively
with full force.

700.name: stoked-sparksurfer
700.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
700.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
700.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.

701.name: pulverizing-pancake
701.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
701.flavor_text:
Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user,
Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body
energetically and attacks the target with full force.

702.name: extreme-evoboost
702.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each.
702.short_effect: Raises all of the user's stats by two stages.
702.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.

703.name: genesis-supernova
703.description: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
703.short_effect: Changes the terrain to Psychic Terrain after inflicting damage.
703.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks
the target with full force. The terrain will be charged
with psychic energy.

704.name: shell-trap
704.description: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user was not yet hit by an opponent's physical move this turn, this move will fail.
704.short_effect: Only inflicts damage if the user was hit by a physical move this turn.
704.flavor_text:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.

705.name: fleur-cannon
705.description: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
705.short_effect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
705.flavor_text:
The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

706.name: psychic-fangs
706.description: Destroys any light screen or reflect on the target's side of the field, then inflicts regular damage.
706.flavor_text:
The user bites the target with its psychic
capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen
and Reflect.

707.name: stomping-tantrum
707.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Power is doubled if the user's last move failed for any reason (i.e., produced the message "But it failed!") or was ineffective due to types.
707.short_effect: Has double power if the user's last move failed.
707.flavor_text:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If
the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.

708.name: shadow-bone
708.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
708.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
708.flavor_text:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.

709.name: accelerock
709.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
709.flavor_text:
The user smashes into the target at high speed.
This move always goes first.

710.name: liquidation
710.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
710.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.
710.flavor_text:
The user slams into the target using a full-force
blast of water. This may also lower the target’s
Defense stat.

711.name: prismatic-laser
711.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
711.short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
711.flavor_text:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

712.name: spectral-thief
712.description: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.
712.short_effect: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts damage.
712.flavor_text:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

713.name: sunsteel-strike
713.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
713.flavor_text:
The user slams into the target with the force of a
meteor. This move can be used on the target 
regardless of its Abilities.

714.name: moongeist-beam
714.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
714.flavor_text:
The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target.
This move can be used on the target regardless of 
its Abilities.

715.name: tearful-look
715.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
715.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage.
715.flavor_text:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

716.name: zing-zap
716.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
716.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
716.flavor_text:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target,
giving it an electric shock. This may also make the
target flinch.

717.name: natures-madness
717.description: Inflicts typeless damage equal to half the target's remaining HP.
717.short_effect: Inflicts damage equal to half the target's HP.
717.flavor_text:
The user hits the target with the force of nature.
It halves the target’s HP.

718.name: multi-attack
718.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
718.short_effect: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
718.flavor_text:
Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the
target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

719.name: 10-000-000-volt-thunderbolt
719.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
719.flavor_text:
The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of
electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it.
Critical hits land more easily.

720.name: mind-blown
720.description: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up. The user still takes damage if the move is blocked by Protect or Substitute, misses, or if the target has Flash Fire.
720.short_effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up.
720.flavor_text:
The user attacks everything around it by causing its
own head to explode. This also damages the user.

721.name: plasma-fists
721.description: After inflicting damage, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn, including status moves. This effect is applied after move type-changing abilities, such as Pixilate and Normalize.
721.short_effect: After inflicting damage, causes all Normal-type moves to become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn.
721.flavor_text:
The user attacks with electrically charged fists.
This move changes Normal-type moves to
Electric-type moves.

722.name: photon-geyser
722.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
722.flavor_text:
The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This
move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever
stat is higher for the user.

723.name: light-that-burns-the-sky
723.description: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.
723.short_effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher.
723.flavor_text:
This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—
whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. 
This move ignores the target’s Ability.

724.name: searing-sunraze-smash
724.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
724.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo,
attacks the target with full force. This move can
ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

725.name: menacing-moonraze-maelstrom
725.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Other Pokémon's abilities cannot activate in response to this move.  In particular, it hits through disguise
725.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala,
attacks the target with full force. This move can
ignore the effect of the target’s Ability.

726.name: lets-snuggle-forever
726.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
726.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu,
punches the target with full force.

727.name: splintered-stormshards
727.description: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
727.short_effect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
727.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,
attacks the target with full force. This move negates
the effect on the battlefield.

728.name: clangorous-soulblaze
728.description: Inflicts sound-based damage to all opposing Pokémon and increases the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user's stats are not raised if the move fails to damage any opposing Pokémon.
728.short_effect: Inflicts damage to all opposing Pokémon and increases the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
728.flavor_text:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o,
attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This
move boosts the user’s stats.

729.name: zippy-zap
729.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
729.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with bursts of electricity
at high speed. This move always goes first and results
in a critical hit.

730.name: splishy-splash
730.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
730.flavor_text:
The user charges a huge wave with electricity and
hits the opposing Pokémon with the wave. This may
also leave the opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

731.name: floaty-fall
731.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
731.flavor_text:
The user floats in the air, and then dives at a steep
angle to attack the target. This may also make the
target flinch.

732.name: pika-papow
732.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
732.flavor_text:
The more Pikachu loves its Trainer, the greater the
move’s power. It never misses.

733.name: bouncy-bubble
733.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
733.flavor_text:
The user attacks by shooting water bubbles at the
target. It then absorbs water and restores its HP by half
the damage taken by the target.

734.name: buzzy-buzz
734.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
734.flavor_text:
The user shoots a jolt of electricity to attack the target.
This also leaves the target with paralysis.

735.name: sizzly-slide
735.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
735.flavor_text:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target.
This also leaves the target with a burn.

736.name: glitzy-glow
736.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
736.flavor_text:
The user bombards the target with telekinetic force.
A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power
of the opposing Pokémon’s special moves.

737.name: baddy-bad
737.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
737.flavor_text:
The user acts bad and attacks the target.
A wondrous wall of light is put up to weaken the power
of the opposing Pokémon’s physical moves.

738.name: sappy-seed
738.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
738.flavor_text:
The user grows a gigantic stalk that scatters seeds
to attack the target. The seeds drain the target’s
HP every turn.

739.name: freezy-frost
739.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
739.flavor_text:
The user attacks with a crystal made of cold frozen
haze. It eliminates every stat change among all the
Pokémon engaged in battle.

740.name: sparkly-swirl
740.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
740.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target by wrapping it with
a whirlwind of an overpowering scent. This also
heals all status conditions of the user’s party.

741.name: veevee-volley
741.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
741.flavor_text:
The more Eevee loves its Trainer, the greater the
move’s power. It never misses.

742.name: double-iron-bash
742.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.
742.flavor_text:
The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest,
and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may
also make the target flinch.

743.name: max-guard
743.description:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
743.short_effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.
743.flavor_text:
This move enables the user to protect itself from
all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used
in succession.

744.name: dynamax-cannon
744.description: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user's side of the field.
744.short_effect: Sets Light Screen on the user's side of the field after inflicting damage.
744.flavor_text:
The user unleashes a strong beam from its core.
This move deals twice the damage if the target
is Dynamaxed.

745.name: snipe-shot
745.description: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user's side of the field.
745.short_effect: Sets Reflect on the user's side of the field after inflicting damage.
745.flavor_text:
The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s
moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this
move to hit the chosen target.

746.name: jaw-lock
746.description: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets leech seed on the target.
746.short_effect: Seeds the target after inflicting damage.
746.flavor_text:
This move prevents the user and the target from
switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes
away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

747.name: stuff-cheeks
747.description: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user's party.
747.short_effect: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.
747.flavor_text:
The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its
Defense stat.

748.name: no-retreat
748.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn, with a 100% chance to make the target flinch.
748.short_effect: Hits twice in one turn, with a 100% chance to make the target flinch.
748.flavor_text:
This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents
the user from switching out or fleeing.

749.name: tar-shot
749.flavor_text:
The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the
target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to
Fire-type moves.

750.name: magic-powder
750.flavor_text:
The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that
changes the target to Psychic type.

751.name: dragon-darts
751.flavor_text:
The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two
targets, this move hits each target once.

752.name: teatime
752.flavor_text:
The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle.
Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

753.name: octolock
753.flavor_text:
The user locks the target in and prevents it from
fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense
and Sp. Def every turn.

754.name: bolt-beak
754.flavor_text:
The user stabs the target with its electrified beak.
If the user attacks before the target, the power of this
move is doubled.

755.name: fishious-rend
755.flavor_text:
The user rends the target with its hard gills.
If the user attacks before the target, the power of this
move is doubled.

756.name: court-change
756.flavor_text:
With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on
either side of the field.

757.name: max-flare
757.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
757.flavor_text:
This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

758.name: max-flutterby
758.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
758.flavor_text:
This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

759.name: max-lightning
759.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
759.flavor_text:
This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for
five turns.

760.name: max-strike
760.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
760.flavor_text:
This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This lowers the target’s Speed stat.

761.name: max-knuckle
761.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
761.flavor_text:
This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This raises ally Pokémon’s Attack stats.

762.name: max-phantasm
762.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
762.flavor_text:
This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This lowers the target’s Defense stat.

763.name: max-hailstorm
763.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
763.flavor_text:
This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

764.name: max-ooze
764.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
764.flavor_text:
This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stats.

765.name: max-geyser
765.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
765.flavor_text:
This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for
five turns.

766.name: max-airstream
766.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
766.flavor_text:
This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This raises ally Pokémon’s Speed stats.

767.name: max-starfall
767.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
767.flavor_text:
This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for
five turns.

768.name: max-wyrmwind
768.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
768.flavor_text:
This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

769.name: max-mindstorm
769.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
769.flavor_text:
This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for
five turns.

770.name: max-rockfall
770.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
770.flavor_text:
This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

771.name: max-quake
771.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
771.flavor_text:
This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This raises ally Pokémon’s Sp. Def stats.

772.name: max-darkness
772.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
772.flavor_text:
This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

773.name: max-overgrowth
773.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
773.flavor_text:
This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for
five turns.

774.name: max-steelspike
774.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
774.flavor_text:
This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use.
This raises ally Pokémon’s Defense stats.

775.name: clangorous-soul
775.flavor_text: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.

776.name: body-press
776.flavor_text:
The user attacks by slamming its body into the target.
The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can
inflict on the target.

777.name: decorate
777.flavor_text:
The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk
stats by decorating the target.

778.name: drum-beating
778.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
778.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
778.flavor_text:
The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots
to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s
Speed stat.

779.name: snap-trap
779.description:
Inflicts regular damage.  For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.  The user continues to use other moves during this time.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times.  Averages to 3 hits per use.

rapid spin cancels this effect.
779.short_effect: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.
779.flavor_text:
The user snares the target in a snap trap for four to
five turns.

780.name: pyro-ball
780.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
780.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
780.flavor_text:
The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching
it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the
target with a burn.

781.name: behemoth-blade
781.flavor_text:
The user becomes a gigantic sword and cuts the target.
This move deals twice the damage if the target
is Dynamaxed.

782.name: behemoth-bash
782.flavor_text:
The user becomes a gigantic shield and slams into
the target. This move deals twice the damage if the
target is Dynamaxed.

783.name: aura-wheel
783.flavor_text:
Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy
stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes
depending on the user’s form.

784.name: breaking-swipe
784.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
784.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
784.flavor_text:
The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks
opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

785.name: branch-poke
785.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
785.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply
pointed branch.

786.name: overdrive
786.flavor_text:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging
a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and
strong vibration.

787.name: apple-acid
787.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created
from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

788.name: grav-apple
788.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
788.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
788.flavor_text:
The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from
high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

789.name: spirit-break
789.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
789.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.
789.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with so much force that it
could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the
target’s Sp. Atk stat.

790.name: strange-steam
790.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
790.short_effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
790.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target by emitting steam.
This may also confuse the target.

791.name: life-dew
791.flavor_text:
The user scatters mysterious water around and restores
the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

792.name: obstruct
792.flavor_text:
This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.
Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

793.name: false-surrender
793.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
793.flavor_text:
The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the
target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

794.name: meteor-assault
794.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
794.short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
794.flavor_text:
The user attacks wildly with its thick leek.
The user can’t move on the next turn, because the
force of this move makes it stagger.

795.name: eternabeam
795.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
795.short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
795.flavor_text:
This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original
form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

796.name: steel-beam
796.description: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up. The user still takes damage if the move is blocked by Protect or Substitute, misses, or if the target has Flash Fire.
796.short_effect: Inflicts damage, and the user takes damage equal to half of its max HP, rounded up.
796.flavor_text:
The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its
entire body. This also damages the user.

797.name: expanding-force
797.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
797.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with its psychic power.
This move’s power goes up and damages all opposing
Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

798.name: steel-roller
798.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
798.flavor_text:
The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move
fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

799.name: scale-shot
799.description: Inflicts regular damage two to five times in a row, raising the user's Speed and lowering the user's Defense by one stage each upon last hit.
799.short_effect: Boosts the user's Speed and lowers their Defense by one stage after inflicting damage two to five times in a row.
799.flavor_text:
The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times
in a row. This move boosts the user’s Speed stat but
lowers its Defense stat.

800.name: meteor-beam
800.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
800.flavor_text:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers space power
and boosts its Sp. Atk stat, then attacks the target
on the next turn.

801.name: shell-side-arm
801.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
801.flavor_text:
This move inflicts physical or special damage,
whichever will be more effective. This may also poison
the target.

802.name: misty-explosion
802.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
802.flavor_text:
The user attacks everything around it and faints upon
using this move. This move’s power is increased on
Misty Terrain.

803.name: grassy-glide
803.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
803.flavor_text:
Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target.
This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

804.name: rising-voltage
804.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
804.flavor_text:
The user attacks with electric voltage rising from
the ground. This move’s power doubles when the target
is on Electric Terrain.

805.name: terrain-pulse
805.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
805.flavor_text:
The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack.
This move’s type and power changes depending on
the terrain when it’s used.

806.name: skitter-smack
806.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
806.flavor_text:
The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also
lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

807.name: burning-jealousy
807.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
807.flavor_text:
The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves
all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted
during the turn with a burn.

808.name: lash-out
808.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
808.flavor_text:
The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward
the target. If the user’s stats were lowered during this
turn, the power of this move is doubled.

809.name: poltergeist
809.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
809.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target by controlling the target’s
item. The move fails if the target doesn’t have an item.

810.name: corrosive-gas
810.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
810.flavor_text:
The user surrounds everything around it with
highly acidic gas and melts away items they hold.

811.name: coaching
811.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
811.flavor_text:
The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon,
boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

812.name: flip-turn
812.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
812.flavor_text:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

813.name: triple-axel
813.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
813.flavor_text:
A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more
powerful with each successful hit.

814.name: dual-wingbeat
814.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
814.flavor_text:
The user slams the target with its wings.
The target is hit twice in a row.

815.name: scorching-sands
815.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
815.short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
815.flavor_text:
The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack.
This may also leave the target with a burn.

816.name: jungle-healing
816.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
816.flavor_text:
The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP
and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally
Pokémon in battle.

817.name: wicked-blow
817.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
817.flavor_text:
The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the
target with a fierce blow. This attack always results
in a critical hit.

818.name: surging-strikes
818.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
818.flavor_text:
The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the
target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This
attack always results in a critical hit.

819.name: thunder-cage
819.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
819.flavor_text:
The user traps the target in a cage of sparking
electricity for four to five turns.

820.name: dragon-energy
820.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
820.flavor_text:
Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks
opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower
the move’s power.

821.name: freezing-glare
821.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
821.flavor_text:
The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes
to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

822.name: fiery-wrath
822.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
822.flavor_text:
The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura
to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

823.name: thunderous-kick
823.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
823.flavor_text:
The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like
movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers
the target’s Defense stat.

824.name: glacial-lance
824.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
824.flavor_text:
The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked
icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

825.name: astral-barrage
825.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
825.flavor_text:
The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small
ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

826.name: eerie-spell
826.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
826.flavor_text:
The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power.
This also removes 3 PP from the target’s last move.

827.name: dire-claw
827.flavor_text: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.

828.name: psyshield-bash
828.flavor_text: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

830.name: stone-axe
830.flavor_text: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.

831.name: springtide-storm
831.flavor_text: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move’s additional effects depend on the user’s form.

832.name: mystical-power
832.flavor_text: The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.

833.name: raging-fury
833.flavor_text: The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.

834.name: wave-crash
834.flavor_text: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

835.name: chloroblast
835.flavor_text: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user's action speed.

836.name: mountain-gale
836.flavor_text: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage.

837.name: victory-dance
837.flavor_text: The user performs a dance to usher in victory. This raises the user’s offensive and defensive stats and increases the damage dealt by the user’s moves by 50 percent.

838.name: headlong-rush
838.flavor_text: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

839.name: barb-barrage
839.flavor_text: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

840.name: esper-wing
840.flavor_text: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user's action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

841.name: bitter-malice
841.flavor_text: The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

842.name: shelter
842.flavor_text: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

843.name: triple-arrows
843.flavor_text: The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target's defensive stats.

844.name: infernal-parade
844.flavor_text: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

845.name: ceaseless-edge
845.flavor_text: The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.

846.name: bleakwind-storm
846.flavor_text: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.

847.name: wildbolt-storm
847.flavor_text: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

848.name: sandsear-storm
848.flavor_text: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

849.name: lunar-blessing
849.flavor_text: The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

850.name: take-heart
850.flavor_text: The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.

851.name: tera-blast
851.flavor_text: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

852.name: silk-trap
852.flavor_text: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

853.name: axe-kick
853.flavor_text: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

854.name: last-respects
854.flavor_text: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

855.name: lumina-crash
855.flavor_text: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

856.name: order-up
856.flavor_text: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

857.name: jet-punch
857.flavor_text: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

858.name: spicy-extract
858.flavor_text: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

859.name: spin-out
859.flavor_text: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

860.name: population-bomb
860.flavor_text: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

861.name: ice-spinner
861.flavor_text: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

862.name: glaive-rush
862.flavor_text: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

863.name: revival-blessing
863.flavor_text: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

864.name: salt-cure
864.flavor_text: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

865.name: triple-dive
865.flavor_text: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

866.name: mortal-spin
866.flavor_text: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

867.name: doodle
867.flavor_text: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

868.name: fillet-away
868.flavor_text: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

869.name: kowtow-cleave
869.flavor_text: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

870.name: flower-trick
870.flavor_text: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

871.name: torch-song
871.flavor_text: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

872.name: aqua-step
872.flavor_text: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

873.name: raging-bull
873.flavor_text: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

874.name: make-it-rain
874.flavor_text: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

875.name: psyblade
875.flavor_text: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

876.name: hydro-steam
876.flavor_text: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

877.name: ruination
877.flavor_text: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

878.name: collision-course
878.flavor_text: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

879.name: electro-drift
879.flavor_text: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

880.name: shed-tail
880.flavor_text: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

882.name: tidy-up
882.flavor_text: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

883.name: snowscape
883.flavor_text: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

884.name: pounce
884.flavor_text: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

885.name: trailblaze
885.flavor_text: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

886.name: chilling-water
886.flavor_text: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

887.name: hyper-drill
887.flavor_text: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

888.name: twin-beam
888.flavor_text: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

889.name: rage-fist
889.flavor_text: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

890.name: armor-cannon
890.flavor_text: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

891.name: bitter-blade
891.flavor_text: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

892.name: double-shock
892.flavor_text: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

893.name: gigaton-hammer
893.flavor_text: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

894.name: comeuppance
894.flavor_text: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

895.name: aqua-cutter
895.flavor_text: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

901.name: blood-moon
901.flavor_text: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

902.name: matcha-gotcha
902.flavor_text: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

903.name: syrup-bomb
903.flavor_text: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

904.name: ivy-cudgel
904.flavor_text: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

905.name: electro-shot
905.flavor_text: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

906.name: tera-starstorm
906.flavor_text: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

907.name: fickle-beam
907.flavor_text: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

908.name: burning-bulwark
908.flavor_text: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

909.name: thunderclap
909.flavor_text: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

910.name: mighty-cleave
910.flavor_text: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

911.name: tachyon-cutter
911.flavor_text: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

912.name: hard-press
912.flavor_text: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

913.name: dragon-cheer
913.flavor_text: The user raises its allies’ morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

914.name: alluring-voice
914.flavor_text: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

915.name: temper-flare
915.flavor_text: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

916.name: supercell-slam
916.flavor_text: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

917.name: psychic-noise
917.flavor_text: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

918.name: upper-hand
918.flavor_text: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

919.name: malignant-chain
919.flavor_text: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

10001.name: shadow-rush
10001.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
10001.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.

10002.name: shadow-blast
10002.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
10002.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

10003.name: shadow-blitz
10003.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

10004.name: shadow-bolt
10004.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
10004.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

10005.name: shadow-break
10005.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

10006.name: shadow-chill
10006.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
10006.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

10007.name: shadow-end
10007.description: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 of its current HP in recoil.
10007.short_effect: User receives 1/2 its HP in recoil.

10008.name: shadow-fire
10008.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
10008.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

10009.name: shadow-rave
10009.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

10010.name: shadow-storm
10010.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

10011.name: shadow-wave
10011.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

10012.name: shadow-down
10012.description: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.
10012.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.

10013.name: shadow-half
10013.description: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
10013.short_effect: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  Must recharge

10014.name: shadow-hold
10014.description:
The target cannot switch out normally.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.  This effect ends when the user leaves the field.

The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell.

Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
10014.short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

10015.name: shadow-mist
10015.description: Lowers the target's evasion by two stages.
10015.short_effect: Lowers the target's evasion by two stages.

10017.name: shadow-shed
10017.description: Removes the effects of light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
10017.short_effect: Removes Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard.

10018.name: shadow-sky
10018.description: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.  Pokémon other than shadow Pokémon take 1/16 their max HP at the end of every turn.  This move is typeless for the purposes of weather ball.
10018.short_effect: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
